attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop teaching of all religious education in schools.Why should religions be protected? There are millions of people who do not believe in fairy stories. If religion has to be taught then equal emphasis should be given to the teaching of atheism as that too provides a valid belief system and doctrine on morality. Otherwise it's just brainwashing.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
